replies.author: 白羊羊
replies.txt_content:
开服器里面这样填
@echo off
title Minecraft服务器
"java.exe" -Xms200M -Xmx200M -jar spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar(这个记得改成你的核心名字)
pause
